# ciscosecureaccess_identity (Data Source)

Data source for retrieving Cisco Secure Access identities

## Example Usage

```terraform
# A list of identities that match the string "devengineer"
data "ciscosecureaccess_identity" "identity" {
  filter = "devengineer"
}

output "identity_out" {
  value = [for s in data.ciscosecureaccess_identity.identity.identities : s.label]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `filter` (String) Filter string used to search for identities

### Read-Only

- `identities` (Attributes List) List of Cisco Secure Access identities corresponding to filter (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--identities))

<a id="nestedatt--identities"></a>
### Nested Schema for `identities`

Read-Only:

- `id` (Number) Unique ID of identity
- `label` (String) Name of identity
- `type` (String) Type of identity
